message: Hello Bob, I'm interested in selling this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. I'm offering it to you for $14,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm interested, but I can only go up to $12,000 at this point.  Let me know what you think.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
